summary: Completed testing of The Locked Study multiplayer escape room game focusing on new keyboard controls and puzzle features. Backend APIs are fully functional (7/7 tests passing), but frontend has room creation flow issues preventing full game access for comprehensive testing.

critical_bugs.issue: Room creation modal does not properly navigate to lobby/room page after submission
critical_bugs.selector: Create Room modal and form submission
critical_bugs.impact: Prevents users from accessing the game, blocking all gameplay functionality

integration_issues.issue: After creating room, user remains on landing page instead of navigating to lobby

ui_bugs.issue: Room creation modal may have overlay interception issues preventing proper form submission

passed_tests: Backend API: All 7 endpoints working (100% success rate)
Landing page loads correctly with proper React components
Create Room modal opens and accepts input
Mobile responsive design - page adapts to mobile viewport (390x844)
Virtual joystick correctly hidden on landing page (should only appear in game)
Game components (GameCanvas) detected in page source
No console errors detected during testing
Form validation works for player name input

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All API endpoints and Socket.IO working perfectly
success_percentage.frontend: 30% - Landing page and modals work, but room creation flow is broken preventing game access

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix room creation flow navigation issue. The room creation form submits but does not navigate to the lobby/room page, preventing users from accessing the game. This blocks testing of all the new features: keyboard controls (WASD/arrows), virtual joystick, and new puzzle modals (Clock, Slider, Color Mix, Book Cipher). The backend APIs are working perfectly, so this is a frontend routing/navigation issue. Check the room creation success handler and navigation logic in the React components.
